Text: Works great.Thank you.LEGO Pirates Of The Caribbean: The Video Game out May 13th.
Didn't work for me on 4.2U wiikey2 all updated. Burnt to DVD using imgburn. Sure it works fine off USB loaders but for those disc users wait for another one.

This didn't work for me either. I couldn't get it to copy over to a wbfs drive in order to try it with CFG loader. Don't know exactly what went wrong but I kept getting errors copying it using Wiithon.
Works fine on my softmodded wii (pal) ,just burned it with imgburn on a verbatim dvd.
So Is it PAL or NTSC?!

wiiGM: Wiithon is the wbfs drive manager for linux. It worked fine for everything but this. I have never ran into problems with it moving stuff to the wbfs drive. I might just update the cios later and use fat32 on the drive just haven't had time. I will find a Win box and try it tho but I doubt it is Wiithon.

@Starmont: USA means NTSC.

@silingual: I'm clueless about Wiithon, all I can tell you is that I used WBFS Manager 3.0 (on a win box, of course) and it works like a charm.
When i start there is a black screen. i'm on usb loader gx on IOS249 base57 rev 20.

I would recommend fat32 and using the wbfs_file cmd line util for linux, so much easier :D
And for black screen on usb loader gx, this seems to be happening with some ntsc games on a pal machine, try it in wiiflow or cfg usb loader.
Burned to disc with img burn 2.4 put in softmodded 3.2 wii, get unable to read disc....3 times burned no go
used Imgburn at 4x on a Memorex dvd-r - works fine on my 4.2u with Uloader (forget the version - its from early 2010 - the Uloader plays everything...)
i download this but i cant get to unzip to put it on my external hard drive can i get some help on it
thanks - hope this works for me :)
This one is being tracked by anti-copywrite infingement. Make sure you remove the tracker ccc.de from the advanced tab when you add it.

Thank you. Good copy.
